actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To protect the American people's ability to make their own health care decisions by ensuring the Federal Government shall not force any American to purchase health insurance.
short_title: Coercion is Not Health Care Act

summary.text: Coercion is Not Health Care Act - Prohibits requiring the purchase or maintenance of health insurance coverage as a condition for participation in, or access to, any federal program or for federal benefit eligibility. Prohibits any individual or agency of the federal government from requiring any individual to purchase health insurance coverage.

titles.title: Coercion is Not Health Care Act
To protect the American people's ability to make their own health care decisions by ensuring the Federal Government shall not force any American to purchase health insurance.
